name: Star Team
description:
Earth is under attack! Explore the stars and find technology, which can help us create a reasonable force to defend our planet!

Your objectives (in case you don't want to find out by yourself):

  1. Start the game (either in browser or after downloading Windows x64 version)
  2. Skip the game's introduction messages
  3. Select (left click) units and send them out on their journey (right click)
  4. Explore unknown locations and collect technologies
  5. Bring technologies back to Earth and level up our HQ
  6. Recruit new units
  7. Get more technology
  8. ... oh, and do that all before time runs out and the aliens arrive!
  9. After screwing up (or winning), leave your feedback below, thanks!
